testcase.name: Validate Google search is working
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on google search page...........................................passed When user enters Selenium in search box.....................................passed And user hits enter.........................................................passed Then user is navigated to search https://www.selenium.dev...................passed

testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on google search page...........................................passed When user enters Youtube in search box......................................passed And user hits enter.........................................................passed Then user is navigated to search https://www.youtube.com....................passed

testcase.name: Validate Google search is working 3

testcase.classname: To test the functionality of the Form on the Home Page of TestProject Demo
testcase.name: To check entering no data in the form will give every user all 5 error messages
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open...................................................passed And user is on the login page...............................................passed When user enters the Michael and 12345......................................passed And clicks on the login button..............................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed When user performs no actions on the form page..............................passed And user clicks on the Save button..........................................passed Then user will get an error message for all fields..........................passed
